Row.Text: I am Aragorn, Son of Arathorn and Heir of Isildur, who are you?
Great to meet you, I am Théoden, son of Thengel, King of Rohan
Elrond, the Lord of Rivendell greets you.
Welcome, I am Thranduil, son of Oropher, King of Mirkwood
Galadriel, the Lady of Light greets you.
Good morning. How are we all? I am Dáin II. Ironfoot, Lord of the Iron Hills.
Who stands before the Dark Lord Sauron?
You stand before Saruman the White, Chief of the Istari and the White Council.
Who stands before Gorkil the Goblin King?
Who stands before Suladân, the Black Serpent?
Who stands before Angamaitë, heir to Castamir?
Who stands before Khamûl, the Black Easterling?
Who stands before Kîonid?
Who stands before The Witch King of Angmar?
Who stands before the King of all the Dúnedain, High King of Gondor and Arnor?
Azog, the Chieftain of Moria greets you.
I am Cirdan the Shipwright, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
Come with me and visit our Capital, you will be able to see the white city in all its glory
Would you like to visit the Golden Hall of Meduseld?
We'd love to welcome you in Rivendell, stranger.
Let me show you the beauty of Mirkwood, come visit our Capital
We'd love to welcome you in Lórien, stranger.
We would be glad to welcome you in our homes.
Come to Mordor and witness its power.
Let's have a meeting at Orthanc, we have matters to discuss.
It is our distinct privilege to extend to you an invitation to visit the realm.
I am honored to offer you the hospitality of our cities: the finest arts, the most delectable feasts, and the melodious songs. Would you care to visit?
Gorkil king of Goblin-Town greets you and invites you to come with him.
Suladan the black Serpent greets you and invites you to come with him.
Khamul the Black Easterling greets you and invites you to come with him.
Witch King of Angmar greets you and invites you to come with him.
Azog Chieftain of Moria greets you and invites you to come with him.
Good.
Very well.
Good.
Good.
Good.
Good.
Good.
Good.
It is acceptable.
Very well.
Very well.
Very well.
Very well.
Yes. You have my gratitude.
On behalf of the people, yes.
Good.

Greetings.
Your delegation was thankfully received, we will treat them like our own people.
Thanks, your delegation was received.
Thanks, your delegation was received.
We appreciate your generous gifts.
We have received your kind gifts and are thankful.
Thanks, we appreciate your gifts.
Your tribute to the Dark Lord has been accepted.
Your gifts will be stored in Isengard. I am thankful.
Your trade delegation arrived, and I am always happy to receive visitors from abroad, especially when they bring gifts.
A thousand thanks for your gifts. Your delegation will be treated with the utmost regard.
We have received your trade delegation and you may rest assured that we will treat them with the dignity they deserve.
Your tribute to the Shadow of the East has been accepted.
Your tribute to the Lord of the Nazgûl has been accepted.
Thanks, we appreciate your gifts.
We appreciate your generous gifts.
We received your gifts, thanks.
We will not accept any delegations from you.
Your presents are not appreciated.
We politely refuse your delegation.
No, we won't accept your people.

No, we don't want your gifts.
No amount of gifts will save you

We reject your offer.
I will not accept.
I will not accept.
I will not accept.
I will not accept.
Keep your meaningless gifts to yourself.
We politely refuse your delegation.
Maybe some other time?
We sent a delegation bringing many gifts, we hope you treat them well.
Will you receive our diplomatic delegation in your capital?
We send a delegation bringing one of our finest horses.
Our delegates are on their way bringing the finest wines from Mirkwood
We sent a delegation bringing delicious Lembras bread, please treat them kindly.
We sent a delegation your way, will you accept them?
The Dark Lord sends you his regards.
I have send on of my most trusted Diplomats to you.

Alright, we will let you pass.

Do you really think we didn't notice your army at our doorstep?

(You have kept the peace on his home continent)
(You are one of my friends)
(You have kept the peace on his home continent)
We have only been given one earth, and I am glad that I am not the only one to respect that. (You are keeping the peace and respecting the environment)
We have only been given one earth, and I am glad that I am not the only one to respect that. (You are respecting the environment)
Your treasury is filling up quite nicely. It's always nice to have such strong income, isn't it?
I love a leader who is surrounded by an impressive military and the productivity of your people.
I extend my heartiest congratulations on the productivity of your people. The world is ours for the taking! And take it, you have.
I extend my heartiest congratulations on the productivity of your people.
I love a leader who is surrounded by an impressive military.

Your empire is headed toward bankruptcy. How can you survive with debt piling up?
You have so few troops. Your people are lazy and unworthy. If you can produce nothing, your civilization will soon be forgotten.
Bountiful lands surround you! How can you ignore them? Your people are lazy and unworthy. If you can produce nothing, your civilization will soon be forgotten.

You have so few troops. Aren't you scared for your life?
